jobDescription: Job Title: 18024 Senior Social Scientist - Intel Support Work Location: Lackland AFB, TX Clearance: Current/Active TS+ Education: Doctorate (preferred) or Master's Degree in required field of knowledge Experience: 12 years Travel: Occasional Job Listing Number: TX18016 LCAT: Senior Social Scientist - Intel Support Overview: The JIOWC assists the Joint Staff in integrating Informational Power; improving Department of Defense ability to meet combatant command (CCMD) information-related requirements, improve development of information-related capabilities, and ensure integration and coherence across the DOD. The JIOWC provides strategic, operational and trans-regional intelligence expertise supporting the JIOWC mission areas of IO assessment, planning and execution, advocacy, and force development. This effort includes integration of current information technologies, identifying and using information operations applicable databases and information sources and operational IO intelligence support. The JIOWC Intelligence Branch (IB) provides Information Operations Intelligence Integration (IOII) to the JIOWC and advocates for joint IOII. In executing this function, IB maintains situational awareness; has both a trans-regional/geographic and functional focus; leverages the Intelligence Community (IC) for collection and production; and works to characterize key aspects of the Information Environment (IE). Specific Duties: Provide human influence/factors support at JIOWC Headquarters in order to accomplish the following tasks: Research, analyze, and develop JIOWC Intelligence Branch (IB) Information Environment products in support of internal and Joint Staff projects/tasking/planning efforts. (CDRL A003)Develop human influence/factors products utilizing psychological, social, cultural, human factors disciplines, and knowledge of strategic communication and public diplomacy to identify and effectively influence individuals or groups of interest.Assess social science methodology and recommend new approaches for product development.
